review-title: Costly phone but cheap service and dacoits
review-text: Very bad product for the price..I have bought iPhone 7 in August 17 and after 8 months ,the ear phones are not working,there is warranty for this ,when I visited the service Center ,they told according to our policy if physical damage happens we will not service ,you can see the photo there is small tear 0.1 cm cut that to also on the rubber which helps the ear phone wire to be flexible.they are showing it as excuse ..the rubber was happened to tear in usage..I accept if there is any damage to wire ,it acceptable ..there are telling according to our article TP1541 ,showing photos and telling that if this happens we don’t replace..very cheap and I am now going to consumer court..physical damage means if happens accidentally damaged ,not by wear and tear..so rude and very cheap

review-title: which is again a bad feature. I connected my Moto 360 watch but ...
review-text: Absolutely ridiculous phone, Dont buy, Phone is single band, i though Apple might have improve it but they dont work on this issue. When a person goes behind walls, calls get disconnected, regarding the basement forget about the signal. Data channel gets lost during the phone rings, if you are working on your laptop or anything & put phone on Hotspot mode your work is lost, which is again a bad feature. I connected my Moto 360 watch but it gets disconnected every 10 minutes I need to tap my watch to connect again.  Apple says wireless charge but you will get wired charger again a cheating. i was using Lumai before that i never had any issues.

I am providing my views to the customers that don't get confused or disappoint  by the review of many other people in this item, that iphone should be known as iphone 7s because apple has launched the iphone 8 with some improved hardware and software.
